paper_abstract: In this letter, it low-cost weighted interpolation scheme (WIS) for deinterlacing within a single frame is discussed. Three useful weights measurements are introduced within the operation window to re duce false decisions on the basis of the LCID algorithm. The WIS algorithm has a simple weight-evaluating structure with low complexity. which therefore makes it easy to implement in hardware. Experimental Lilts demonstrated that the WIS algorithm performs better than previous techniques.
paper_title: Weighted Interpolation Scheme for Robust Video Deinterlacing
